definition: embankment or foothpath between paddy fields
strip of high ground/low earth dyke separating fields

sentences.english: She lived in a band under a hedge.
sentences.chinese: 她住在灌木籬笆下面的田埂裏。

sentences.english: We had a rest on the ridges.
One morning a little rabbit sat on a bank.
sentences.chinese: 一天早上，一隻小兔坐在田埂上。

sentences.english: The best rice land is level, conveniently diked for alternating irrigation and drainage.
sentences.chinese: 稻田最好是在平地上，築田埂以利排灌。

sentences.english: When field bunds which planted soybean or kept weeds, spiders density increased in rice field.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛在稻田的密度在田埂種豆或蓄草條件下增高。

sentences.english: Some unknown flowers, the flower, that a bunch of the spill on the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 一些不知名的小花，這一朵，那一簇的灑在田埂上。

sentences.english: You looked that boundary ridge between fields fish pond orchard pasture, everywhere is the abundant harvest picture.
sentences.chinese: 你看那田埂魚塘果園牧場，到處是豐收景象。

sentences.english: Extra care must be taken to be sure that water does not cut through any of the ridges between contour furrows.
sentences.chinese: 要格外細心以確保水流不會穿越等高溝間的田埂。

sentences.english: Go on the ridge of field of overgrow fireweed , one pace is flabby accurate meeting falls.
sentences.chinese: 走在長滿雜草的田埂上，一步不穩準會跌倒。

sentences.english: One day, the man sat on the ridge of the field to have a rest after long working.
sentences.chinese: 一天，這個宋國人在田裏忙了很久，坐在田埂上休息。

sentences.english: He piled the wheat stubble along the ridge of the fields.
sentences.chinese: 小麥茬子堆在了田埂邊上。

definition: lines on ridges on ploughed field
embankment or foothpath between paddy fields
strip of high ground/low earth dyke separating fields
